details.description: Find the right number, email or address to contact DVLA about driving licences, vehicle tax, vehicle registration
details.body:
There are different contact details for DVLA depending on your enquiry.

Check the driving section first to see if your question is answered there.

General information

You can use the following information or the online email service to contact DVLA.

Driver Licensing Enquiries

Telephone: 0300 790 6801
Textphone: 0300 123 1278
Fax: 0300 123 0784
Fax from outside the UK: +44 (0)1792 786 369
Monday to Friday, 8am to 7pm
Saturday, 8am to 2pm

Drivers Customer Services
Correspondence Team
DVLA
Swansea
SA6 7JL

Driver Check Service

Hire car companies can contact the Driver Check Service to check the licence of someone hiring a car. The driver must give their permission for the check.

Driver Check Service

09061 393 837
Calls cost 51p per minute from a BT landline.
Calls from other networks or mobiles may vary.

Driving and medical issues

Drivers Medical Enquiries

Telephone: 0300 790 6806 (car or motorcycle), 0300 790 6807 (bus, coach or lorry)
Fax: 0845 850 0095
Monday to Friday, 8am to 5:30pm
Saturday, 8am to 1pm

Drivers Medical Enquiries
DVLA
Swansea
SA99 1TU

Registration and tax

You can use the following information or the online email service to contact DVLA.

Vehicle Registration and Tax enquiries

Telephone: 0300 790 6802
Text phone: 0300 123 1279
Fax: 0300 123 0798
Monday to Friday, 8am to 7pm
Saturday, 8am to 2pm

Vehicle Customer Services
DVLA
Swansea
SA99 1AR

DVLA local offices

You can also contact your nearest DVLA local office.

DVLA local offices and the contact centre are closed on public holidays.
